Fleximizer : A indie game developer

Death Blocks 4

“Death Blocks 4” is a FPS to shoot looming zombies. So many features were added! The place you dispatched has occupied by dreadful zombies. The longer you stay, the more danger zombies appear… Blow’em all and survive!

Death Blocks 3

“Death Blocks 3” is a FPS to shoot looming zombies. So many features were added! The place you dispatched has occupied by dreadful zombies. The longer you stay, the more danger zombies appear… Blow’em all and survive!

Death Blocks 2

“Death Blocks 2” is a FPS to shoot looming zombies. The place you dispatched has occupied by dreadful zombies. The longer you stay, the more danger zombies appear… Blow’em all and survive!

Death Blocks

"Death Blocks" is a FPS to shoot looming zombies. The place you dispatched was the town occupied by dreadful zombies. The longer you stay, the more danger zombies appear…blow'em all and survive!

Dead Survival Assault

You are left alone in the danger zone! Shoot looming zombies , and survive!

Let's enjoy!!
